translation.en: ♪ That sets the girl apart ♪
♪ Is the kindness that shows royalty ♪
♪ It's etched upon her heart ♪
[Phil on TV] And welcome back!
Andrea and I are thrilled to be here
bringing you the 144th Princess Procession!
translation.it: di fare la cronaca della 144ª Parata delle principesse!

translation.en: That's right, Phil! And where are those princesses processing?
translation.it: Proprio così, Phil! E dove sarà la parata?

translation.en: [Phil] Glad you asked, Andrea.
Why, to Princess Charm School, of course,
[imitating Phil] "Where Glorious Girls Meet Dreams Of Destiny!"
translation.it: "Dove le ragazze più splendide vivono i sogni del destino!"

translation.en: [Mom] Emily!
I hope you're doing your homework and not just watching that parade!
translation.it: Spero tu stia facendo i compiti e non guardando la parata!

translation.en: I am, Mom!
[Phil] Yes, every girl dreams it, but only a few can achieve it.
translation.it: Sì, tutte lo sognano, ma solo in poche ci riescono.

translation.en: For those born to royalty from kingdoms far and wide,
translation.it: Chi nasce aristocratica, in regni lontani e remoti,

translation.en: a chance to earn their titles as princesses.
translation.it: ha la possibilità di ottenere il titolo di principessa.

translation.en: [Andrea] And for those born commoners,
the opportunity to win a place as a princess' most trusted advisor,
translation.it: ha l'occasione di diventare la consigliera più fidata di una principessa,

translation.en: a lady royal!
Boo! [gasps]
Blair! You're here!
Dance with me, Princess Emily. [chuckling]
[Andrea] Oh, Phil, it's a beautiful day here in Gardania,
translation.it: Phil, è una bellissima giornata qui a Gardania.

translation.en: I've never seen so many people for the parade!
translation.it: Non avevo mai visto così tanta gente alla parata!

translation.en: [Phil] I know, Andrea. You couldn't be more right. It's a lovely day,
translation.it: È vero, Andrea. Hai proprio ragione. È una bella giornata.

translation.en: everybody's having a wonderful time...
You'll hurt your eyes looking at this.
translation.it: Ti fai male agli occhi a guardarla così.

translation.en: Let me get your tiara, Princess Blair.
translation.it: Ti prendo la coroncina, principessa Blair.

translation.en: [scoffs] I am so not a princess.
translation.it: Non sono per niente una principessa.

translation.en: -[Phil] ...costumes are magnificent. -[Andrea] They are indeed, Phil.
translation.it: - …i costumi sono magnifici. - Lo sono eccome, Phil.

translation.en: Every girl's a princess.
Some of them just have fancier crowns.
translation.it: È che alcune hanno corone più eleganti.

translation.en: [Blair] Mom okay?
Kind of. The doctor says she's comfortable.
translation.it: Più o meno. Il dottore dice che sta benino.

translation.en: Comfortable.
She should be all better.
[sighs] She'll get there, though.
I just have to keep working.
Then we can afford our own little house in a better area.
translation.it: Così, potremo permetterci una casetta in una zona migliore.

translation.en: With better doctors for Mom?
translation.it: Con medici migliori per la mamma?

translation.en: Mmm-hmm, and a better place for you to grow up.
translation.it: Sì, e un posto migliore in cui crescere.

translation.en: Some place right out of the pictures you draw.
translation.it: Che sia come uno dei tuoi disegni.

translation.en: Hi, Mom! I brought you a blueberry scone.
translation.it: Ciao, mamma! Ti ho portato un dolcetto ai mirtilli.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
It's the least I can do.
translation.it: È il minimo che posso fare.

translation.en: [Emily] It's time! It's time! It's time!
It's Princess Charm School lottery time!
translation.it: C'è la lotteria dell'Accademia per principesse!

translation.en: We have to watch!
[announcer] And now we'll hear from Headmistress Alexandra Privet.
translation.it: E adesso parlerà la direttrice, Alexandra Privet.

translation.en: At Princess Charm School,
those born to the royal life unlock their princess potential.
translation.it: chi nasce nobile può sbloccare il suo potenziale da principessa.

translation.en: Yet every year, one regular citizen of Gardania... [all cheering]
translation.it: Però, tutti gli anni, una cittadina comune di Gardania

translation.en: wins a full scholarship to the school,
translation.it: vince una borsa di studio per l'Accademia,

translation.en: with a chance to become a lady royal and change her life forever.
translation.it: per poter diventare una dama reale e cambiare la propria vita per sempre.

translation.en: Will it be you?
Oh, I hope, I hope, I hope.
Did I mention I hope?
translation.it: Ho già detto che ci spero?

translation.en: When you're old enough you'll enter. I promise.
translation.it: Quando avrai l'età, parteciperai. Te lo prometto.

translation.en: To choose this year's lottery winner, I present Miss Delancy Devin.
translation.it: A scegliere la vincitrice di quest'anno, sarà la signorina Delancy Devin.

translation.en: You of course mean Princess Delancy Devin.
translation.it: Ovviamente, intendevi la principessa Delancy Devin.

translation.en: My daughter will soon be ruler of Gardania.
translation.it: Mia figlia presto sarà sovrana di Gardania.

translation.en: Yes, provided she successfully completes the semester.
Miss Delancy?
Blair Willows. [audience cheering]
-[Phil] And there you have it! -[gasps]
-Blair Willows! This year's winner... -Yes! I knew it!
translation.it: - Blair Willows! La vincitrice… - Sì! Lo sapevo!

translation.en: -Woo-hoo! -What? But...
[in singsong voice] Who's a lady royal? Blair's a lady royal!
translation.it: Chi è la dama reale? Blair è la dama reale!

translation.en: -Emily, that's not possible. -Who works in the palace?
translation.it: - Emily, non è possibile. - Chi lavora a palazzo?

translation.en: Blair works in the palace!
-Uh-huh, go Blair! -I never even...
translation.it: - Sì! Forza Blair! - Non ho neanche…

translation.en: Uh-huh, go Blair!
[gasps] You entered for me?
Only five or six times.
A day. For an entire year.
translation.it: Al giorno. Per un anno intero.

translation.en: [in singsong voice] Who's gonna be a lady royal?
-Blair's gonna be a lady royal! -Emily!
[doorbell rings] [gasps] They're here? They're really here!
Mom?
Congratulations. I'm here to take you to Princess Charm School.
translation.it: Congratulazioni. Sono qui per portarla all'Accademia per principesse.

translation.en: No, I'm sorry.
There's been a mistake.
I'm not going to Princess Charm School.
[Emily] Yes, you are!
Emily, I don't belong with a bunch of princesses and lady royals.
translation.it: Emily, non sono fatta per stare tra principesse e dame reali.

translation.en: Look at me! I'm a waitress!
I've got straws in my pocket and ketchup on my socks.
translation.it: Ho cannucce in tasca e ketchup sui calzini.

translation.en: You look perfect.
Thank you. But the girls there won't think so.
translation.it: Grazie. Ma quelle ragazze non la penseranno così.

translation.en: And I have responsibilities here.
translation.it: E poi, ho delle responsabilità qui.

translation.en: Blair, it wasn't right of Emily to go behind your back,
translation.it: Blair, Emily non avrebbe dovuto farlo senza dirtelo,

translation.en: but this is a big opportunity.
A position as a lady royal?
Would change our lives forever.
translation.it: Ci cambierebbe la vita per sempre.

translation.en: I'll go.
Yes!
Wow, you get to ride in a carriage!
-It's time to go. -Now?
Now.
[laughs nervously] Uh... Just let me pull together some clothes and I...
It's all at the school.
We need to leave now, or you forfeit your scholarship.
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare subito o perderà la borsa di studio.

translation.en: But what about my--
Tick-tock, tick-tock, tick-tock.
I love you.
I won't let you down.
[Emily] Blair!
[Emily] Blair!
-Goodbye! -Goodbye!
Bye, Mom! Bye, Emily!
Goodbye, Blair!
You'll always be my princess.
translation.it: Sarai la mia principessa per sempre.

translation.en: Ah! Great!
I've already flunked carriage riding.
translation.it: Sono già bocciata in viaggio in carrozza.

translation.en: Thanks for the ride.
Uh, hey, I wonder if you could maybe show me--
translation.it: Mi chiedevo se potesse farmi vedere…

translation.en: Or not.
-Ooh! -Hey!
Pardon me.
You scared me!
Aww, it's okay. You're a good dog.
translation.it: Va tutto bene. Sei proprio bravo.

translation.en: "Prince." [barks]
[laughs] Good boy, Prince.
Hmm. You must be Blair Willows.
We don't usually find our future lady royals sprawled on the floor.
translation.it: Di solito non troviamo le nostre future dame reali per terra.

translation.en: Oh! Um, hi.
Sorry about the floor.
He's just... He's very sweet.
Not usually. He's normally quite shy.
translation.it: Non di solito. In genere, è timido.

translation.en: Go lie down, Prince.
I am Headmistress Privet.
Welcome to Charm School.
Thank you. It's really an honor.
Shall I take you to your locker?
Princess Charm School was founded on the principles
translation.it: L'Accademia per principesse fu fondata con l'idea

translation.en: of instilling young women with character and confidence.
translation.it: di infondere alle ragazze carattere e fiducia in sé stesse.

translation.en: And it has been preparing them for royal life for nearly five centuries.
translation.it: Le prepara alla vita da nobili da quasi cinque secoli.

translation.en: Emily would love this.
She's always wanted to come here.
My little sister. She's the one who entered me in the lottery.
translation.it: La mia sorellina. È stata lei a iscrivermi alla lotteria.

translation.en: I never would have come,
but it's a chance to make a better life for her and for my mom.
translation.it: ma è un modo per migliorare la vita sua e di mia madre.

translation.en: Blair, only 27% of the lottery girls make it through to graduation.
translation.it: Blair, solo il 27% delle ragazze della lotteria arrivano al diploma.

translation.en: Do you think you can handle it?
I think so. I'll sure try.
You'll notice that all of our students
translation.it: Noterai che tutti le nostre studentesse

translation.en: carry themselves with dignity and sophistication.
translation.it: si comportano in maniera elegante e signorile.

translation.en: [gasps] Weekly dress-up tea socials!
translation.it: Tè in ghingheri tutte le settimane!

translation.en: Yes! And we can give each other fun nicknames and swap shoes!
translation.it: Sì! Potremmo darci dei soprannomi e scambiarci le scarpe!

translation.en: -[both scream] -Shh, ladies.
[girl whispering] Dress up tea socials in our dorm room every week!
translation.it: Tè in ghingheri in camera nostra tutte le settimane.

translation.en: This is the original Princess Charm School.
translation.it: Questa è l'Accademia per principesse originale.

translation.en: The centuries-old castle.
Most classes and the student dorms are in our new section.
translation.it: La maggior parte delle aule e delle camere sono nella nuova sezione.

translation.en: Our world-class amenities
translation.it: I nostri servizi, di prima qualità,

translation.en: include a state-of-the-art digital classroom.
To your left, our Olympic-sized ballroom.
translation.it: A sinistra, c'è la nostra sala da ballo olimpionica.

translation.en: And my personal favorite, our luxurious spa.
translation.it: E il mio preferito, la nostra lussuosa spa.

translation.en: I do enjoy a good mani-pedi from time to time.
translation.it: Ogni tanto mi piace farmi una bella manicure.

translation.en: -[female voice] Blair Willows! -Ah. Here we are.
Anyone seen a "Blair Willows"?
-[laughs nervously] -At your service, miss?
This is Grace.
Your personal princess assistant.
translation.it: La tua assistente personale da studentessa.

translation.en: Every student at Princess Charm School has one.
translation.it: Tutte le studentesse dell'Accademia ne hanno una.

translation.en: They are usually punctual, and usually helpful.
translation.it: Di solito sono puntuali e di grande aiuto.

translation.en: I shall leave you in her... capable hands.
translation.it: Ti lascio nelle sue abili mani.

translation.en: I am so sorry.
It was buttercream.
Now if someone spills a pot roast on me, I'll be a complete meal.
translation.it: Ora manca solo un arrosto, e avrò addosso un pasto completo.

translation.en: I just wanted to give you the traditional welcome cupcake.
translation.it: Volevo portarti il tradizionale dolcetto di benvenuto.

translation.en: You wanna change clothes? Follow me.
It has everything a princess student needs.
translation.it: Ha tutto quello che serve a una studentessa.

translation.en: Books, pens, paper, make-up mirrors,
translation.it: Libri, penne, carta, specchio per truccarsi,

translation.en: sparkle purse collection. [laughs]
And of course emergency pumps.
translation.it: E naturalmente i tacchi di emergenza.

translation.en: This is my locker?
Then we've got your beauty supplies.
translation.it: Poi ci sono i prodotti di bellezza.

translation.en: Jewel-encrusted hairbrush, diamond lipstick.
translation.it: Spazzola tempestata di gemme, lucidalabbra con brillantini.

translation.en: Oh, I love this perfume! Ooh! Watch out.
I'm so sorry. It was an accident.
translation.it: Mi dispiace tanto. Non l'ho fatto apposta.

translation.en: [sniffing] Um, Delancy?
There's such a thing as too much perfume.
translation.it: Puoi anche metterti un po' meno profumo.

translation.en: Portia!
Oh, no, you're...
Furious, that's what I am!
How dare you?
Look, Delancy. They're serving floor cakes.
translation.it: Guarda, Delancy. Servono dolcetti da terra.

translation.en: I just got here.
You just got here?
[laughs] Let me guess.
Blair Willows, the lottery girl?
Yes! So you understand.
Oh, this is all so new to me, and I--
translation.it: Per me è tutta una novità e…

translation.en: I understand the lottery is a joke.
translation.it: So che la lotteria è una farsa.

translation.en: Isn't it obvious?
Commoners like you don't belong here.
translation.it: La gente comune come te non dovrebbe stare qui.

translation.en: Right, Portia?
[mumbling] What?
Yes, Your Wonderful... [chokes] Ness.
I need a princess pamper package, pronto!
translation.it: Ho bisogno di farmi coccolare, subito!

translation.en: Make way! To the spa!
Um, are you taking orders?
Because I would do anything for a double foam mocha latte.
translation.it: Perché muoio dalla voglia di un cappuccino con doppia schiuma.

translation.en: The floorcake was delicious.
translation.it: Il dolcetto da terra era delizioso.

translation.en: [Delancy] Portia!
As you can see, everyone here is so nice.
translation.it: Come puoi vedere, sono tutte molto gentili qui.

translation.en: Most of the time.
Uh, so let's get you ready for school.
translation.it: Il più delle volte. Ora prepariamoci per l'Accademia.

translation.en: Locker, please extend curtain for a princess primp.
translation.it: Armadietto, distendi la tendina per i preparativi da principessa.

translation.en: Oh, it's fabulous!
The best thing about Princess Charm School!
translation.it: La cosa migliore dell'Accademia per principesse!

translation.en: Go on. Get gorgeous!
Oh, pretty as a princess.
Lady royal.
Okay, now your schedule and let's get you settled.
translation.it: Okay, vediamo il programma e diamoci dentro.

translation.en: I'd love to.
Hey! Our new roomie, right?
translation.it: Ehi! La nostra nuova compagna di stanza.

translation.en: Princess or lady royal?
Lady royal. You?
Princess. Isla, too.
Do you play?
[Hadley] Nice.
Oh! I'm so sorry!
Are you kidding?
Isla's been Miss Mum's-The-Word about the tunes
translation.it: Isla non dice nulla sulla sua musica

translation.en: and I've been dying to hear them!
translation.it: e io morivo dalla voglia di sentirla!

translation.en: [dance music stops] I'm still working on them.
They're not ready for anyone to hear.
translation.it: Non è ancora pronta per l'ascolto.

translation.en: Really? What I heard rocked.
translation.it: Sul serio? Quello che ho sentito era forte.

translation.en: Yeah! See? Play one of your tunes for us!
translation.it: Sì! Visto? Suonaci una tua canzone!

translation.en: That's okay. No rush.
-I'm Hadley. -Blair.
Blair Willows? The lottery winner?
translation.it: Blair Willows? La vincitrice della lotteria?

translation.en: Is it that obvious?
Yup, 'cause they announced it on TV
translation.it: Sì, perché l'hanno detto alla TV

translation.en: that "Blair Willows" was the lottery winner.
translation.it: che "Blair Willows" ha vinto la lotteria.

translation.en: Oh, right. Sorry.
Guess I'm just a little overwhelmed.
translation.it: Sono solo un po' sopraffatta dagli eventi.

translation.en: [Privet on PA] All princesses and lady-royals-in-training
translation.it: Tutte le studentesse principesse e le dame reali

translation.en: are due at the Starlight Welcome in one minute.
translation.it: devono essere tra un minuto al Benvenuto sotto le stelle.

translation.en: -[all gasp] -One minute?
Welcome, students.
And dogs.
Tonight you begin the greatest challenge of your life,
translation.it: Stasera inizierete la più grande sfida della vostra vita,

translation.en: training to be a princess or lady royal,
the most important jobs of the realm.
translation.it: i ruoli più importanti del regno.

translation.en: Your classmates, Lorraine and Josette, are bringing around your training tiaras.
translation.it: Le vostre compagne, Lorraine e Josette, vi daranno le coroncine didattiche.

translation.en: Thank you. [Privet] Don't get too used to them.
Only those who succeed this semester will earn the real versions.
translation.it: Solo chi supererà questo semestre riceverà quella vera.

translation.en: Fail as a princess-in-training and you will not be crowned.
translation.it: Se verrete bocciate, non sarete incoronate.

translation.en: We have very high expectations here.
Each of you must attend every class on time and in uniform,
translation.it: Dovete essere a lezione puntuali e in uniforme

translation.en: and your grades must be exceptional.
translation.it: e i voti devono essere eccezionali.

translation.en: That said, I believe every one of you has princess potential.
translation.it: Detto questo, penso che tutte abbiate la stoffa della principessa.

translation.en: Work hard and stay dedicated,
and you will achieve it.
I'm so sorry, Dame Devin,
that's a nasty little tickle there, would you like a glass of water?
translation.it: che brutto mal di gola. Vuole un bicchiere d'acqua?

translation.en: I'd like a proper introduction.
translation.it: Voglio una presentazione come si deve.

translation.en: [chuckles] Certainly.
Students.
Dame Devin.
I have an earth-shattering announcement.
This is my last semester of teaching before I...
translation.it: È il mio ultimo semestre da insegnante prima che io…

translation.en: Um, before my daughter takes over Gardania.
translation.it: Prima che mia figlia diventi sovrana di Gardania.

translation.en: No, no, hold back your tears.
Ms. Privet will take over my classes next year.
translation.it: L'anno prossimo, mi sostituirà la direttrice Privet.

translation.en: In her own little way.
Of course, no one knows the royal life as I do.
translation.it: Certo, nessuno conosce la vita di corte quanto me.

translation.en: I've lived at the palace ever since
translation.it: Ho vissuto a palazzo da quando

translation.en: my dear sister-in-law Queen Isabella and her family died,
translation.it: la mia cara cognata, la regina Isabella, e la sua famiglia sono morti.

translation.en: -and it has been my great... -[both] If they died...
translation.it: - ed è il mio… - Se sono morti…

translation.en: [both] You know the legend?
translation.it: - Conosci la leggenda? - Conosci la leggenda?

translation.en: What legend?
There's a legend that Queen Isabella and her family
translation.it: La leggenda dice che la regina Isabella e la sua famiglia

translation.en: didn't all die in the accident.
I love that you know that story.
translation.it: Che forte che sai questa storia.

translation.en: ...and so I welcome you all to Princess Charm School.
translation.it: …e quindi vi do il benvenuto all'Accademia per principesse.

translation.en: May your time here be magical.
translation.it: Che il tempo passato qui sia magico.

translation.en: Two lines, everyone!
Curtseys to all and then everyone's excused for bed.
translation.it: Fate la riverenza e poi andate a letto.

translation.en: [Hadley] Favorite legend about the Gardania Royal Family, go.
translation.it: La tua leggenda preferita sulla famiglia reale di Gardania, vai.

translation.en: I don't know any of the legends.
So missing out.
Isla, go.
My fave's a simple one.
Gardania's magical crown.
Gardania's magical crown? [grunts]
[Blair] Oh, no.
Ugh! You again?
I'm so sorry.
What is with you? You're a walking disaster!
translation.it: Che problema hai? Sei un disastro ambulante!

translation.en: I don't think Delancy and I are going to hang out much.
translation.it: Non credo che io e Delancy diventeremo molto amiche.

translation.en: That's okay, you'll be hanging out with us.
translation.it: Non fa niente, ci siamo noi con te.

translation.en: Better believe it. And wait till classes start tomorrow.
translation.it: Esatto. E vedrai domani a lezione.

translation.en: I bet you can do anything she can do.
translation.it: Scommetto che sei in grado di fare tutto quello che fa lei.

translation.en: Sure, I can do anything she can do.
translation.it: Certo. Sono in grado di fare tutto quello che fa lei.

translation.en: I cannot do anything she can do.
translation.it: Non sono in grado di fare niente di quello che fa lei.

translation.en: Poise. Proper poise commands respect, a necessity for anyone in the royal life.
translation.it: Il portamento giusto suscita rispetto, necessario nella vita di corte.

translation.en: Thank you, Delancy.
Now, princesses, lady royals, let's see what you can do, hmm.
translation.it: Ora, principesse, dame reali, vediamo cosa sapete fare.

translation.en: Start with one book and glide, glide.
translation.it: Cominciate con un libro e passeggiate.

translation.en: Smoothly, gracefully.
I can balance a tray of coffee cups for customers, right?
translation.it: So portare un vassoio con le tazze per i clienti.

translation.en: Of course, I've never done it on my head.
translation.it: Certo, non l'ho mai fatto con la testa.

translation.en: Hadley, you're tenderizing your brains. Stop.
translation.it: Hadley, ti ammacchi la testa. Basta.

translation.en: That's lovely, Isla.
Thank you, Dame Devin.
If you want to be the crazy princess who hears music in her head.
translation.it: Se vuoi essere la principessa pazza che sente la musica nella sua testa.

translation.en: Lorraine, you're practicing poise, not lifting weights.
translation.it: Lorraine, ti stai esercitando nel portamento, non nel sollevamento pesi.

translation.en: Like a princess, Josette, not a migrating duck.
translation.it: Come una principessa, Josette, non come un'anatra che migra.

translation.en: Portia.
What?
[sighs] You're doing fine.
Come on. Come on!
Do it for Emily.
Did you get those shoes at a garage sale?
translation.it: Hai comprato le scarpe di seconda mano?

translation.en: Is it nap time?
How come nobody told me?
translation.it: Perché non me l'ha detto nessuno?

translation.en: You. What do you have to say for this disaster?
translation.it: Tu. Cosa mi dici di questo disastro?

translation.en: [sighs] It was an accident, Dame Devin.
translation.it: Tu. Cosa mi dici di questo disastro? Non l'ho fatto apposta, dama Devin.

translation.en: -I was trying... -Stand up.
You're the lottery girl, aren't you?
Yes, Dame Devin.
I should have known. Meet my eyes, girl.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto capirlo. Guardami negli occhi.

translation.en: A true lady royal never hangs her head.
translation.it: Una vera dama reale non china mai la testa.

translation.en: Mother? You were going to say something to Blair?
translation.it: Mamma? Stavi dicendo qualcosa a Blair?

translation.en: Yes!
You are utterly unfit for the royal life!
translation.it: Sei del tutto inadatta alla vita di corte!

translation.en: -I want you out of this class! -[all girls gasp]
translation.it: Ti voglio fuori da questo corso!

translation.en: You might also think about whether someone from your station in life
translation.it: E chiediti anche se qualcuno della tua classe sociale

translation.en: should even stay someplace where you so clearly don't belong!
translation.it: possa stare in un posto in cui chiaramente non appartiene!

translation.en: I understand.
They're serving strawberry swirl today!
translation.it: Oggi c'è la torta alla fragola!

translation.en: Thank you, Miranda.
Don't let Dame Devin bug you.
translation.it: Non farti influenzare da dama Devin.

translation.en: Legend has it she's actually a reptile alien
translation.it: La leggenda dice che in realtà sia un rettile alieno

translation.en: from the other side of the universe.
You know what really bugs me, Portia?
translation.it: Sai cosa mi dà fastidio, Porzia?

translation.en: Yodeling hand puppets?
When a commoner like Blair comes to Princess Charm School,
translation.it: Quando una come Blair viene all'Accademia per principesse,

translation.en: she makes it less special.
She makes us less special.
She does? She totally does.
Specialness is like this piece of cake.
translation.it: Essere speciali è come questa fetta di torta.

translation.en: There's only so much to go around.
translation.it: Non ce n'è abbastanza per tutti.

translation.en: If Blair takes a huge chunk of it,
translation.it: Se Blair prende una fetta grossa,

translation.en: what's left for us?
You stole my cake!
Not me.
Blair!
How dare she! I wanted that cake.
Don't worry. I have a feeling she won't
translation.it: Non preoccuparti. Ho la sensazione che non ruberà la torta ancora per molto.

translation.en: be around to steal cake much longer.
translation.it: Ho la sensazione che non ruberà la torta ancora per molto.

translation.en: Yes, your Royal Sneakiness?
So we're coming around showing everyone our school spirit cheer.
translation.it: Siamo qui per mostrare a tutte il nostro spirito studentesco.

translation.en: 'Cause whenyou've got spirit,
it's what we want to hear!
Thanks, Lorraine. Josette.
Yeah. That was cute. Rhyming and all.
translation.it: Sì. Molto carino. Faceva anche rima.

translation.en: We'll see ya.
Oh, that wasn't the cheer. Had to make that clear.
translation.it: Non è il coro questo Era solo un pretesto

translation.en: But don't you ever fear.
'Cause the time to cheer is here!
translation.it: Perché è il momento di gioire!

translation.en: One, two, three!
[both] Princess Charm School is the best!
translation.it: L'Accademia per principesse è senza uguali!

translation.en: Royal skills put to the test!
We can dance and we've got poise!
Now it's time to make some noise!
Go, Princess Charm School! [cheering wildly]
Wow. Cool cheer. Thanks for sharing.
translation.it: Siete bravissime. Grazie per avercelo fatto sentire.

translation.en: [both] Part of caring!
translation.it: - È un piacere! - È un piacere!

translation.en: You guys ready?
I'm so sorry... I...
I have to go.
Serves her right for stealing my cake.
translation.it: Così impara a rubarmi la torta.

translation.en: [sighs] Who am I kidding?
I don't fit in here at all.
translation.it: Questo posto non fa per me.

translation.en: I'm like a burp in a symphony.
translation.it: Sono come un rutto in una sinfonia.

translation.en: You have to give yourself more time.
You're right. With more time,
translation.it: Hai ragione. Se mi do più tempo, riesco a distruggere l'intera Accademia.

translation.en: maybe I could destroy the whole school.
translation.it: Se mi do più tempo, riesco a distruggere l'intera Accademia.

translation.en: No, Dame Devin's right,
I'm not Princess Charm School material.
translation.it: Non sono fatta per l'Accademia per principesse.

translation.en: Seriously? Blair.
Dame Devin was Princess Charm School material.
translation.it: Dama Devin aveva la stoffa da Accademia per principesse.

translation.en: What do you mean?
Oh, I know this story!
She was a lottery winner, but no princess picked her to be a lady royal,
translation.it: Aveva vinto la lotteria, ma nessuna l'aveva scelta come dama reale,

translation.en: not even her sister-in-law, Queen Isabella.
translation.it: nemmeno sua cognata, la regina Isabella.

translation.en: Exactly. If Delancy weren't in line for the throne,
translation.it: Esatto. Se Delancy non fosse in linea per il trono,

translation.en: Dame Devin would be no more special than anyone else.
translation.it: dama Devin non sarebbe così speciale.

translation.en: [groans] But it's not just her.
Everyone thinks I don't belong here.
translation.it: Tutte pensano che questo non sia il posto per me.

translation.en: Everyone except you guys.
A little help, please? [grunting]
Ooh, care package!
It's for you from... Emily Willows?
translation.it: È per te da parte di Emily Willows?

translation.en: Emily? Really?
[Isla] That's pretty.
[Blair] Emily drew it.
She loved the story of me being found on my mom's doorstep.
translation.it: Ama la storia di quando mia madre mi trovò sulla soglia di casa.

translation.en: I was only one.
Mom adopted Emily a few years later.
translation.it: La mamma adottò Emily qualche anno dopo.

translation.en: They're everything to me.
[Privet] One-two-three, one-two-three,
one-two-three, one-two-three,
one-two-three, one-two-three,
and one-two-three, one-two-three,
-one-two-three, one-two-three... -Ow.
[Privet sighs] Again, Blair?
I'm sorry.
You've stepped on eight of my toes!
translation.it: Mi hai pestato otto dita del piede!

translation.en: I only have four left!
Two. You have two left.
That's even worse!
Thank you, everyone. See you tomorrow.
translation.it: Grazie a tutte. Ci vediamo domani.

translation.en: Not you, Blair.
I'd like to see you after class.
Well, isn't that a surprise?
[stammers] Is... Is everything okay?
No, it's not, Blair.
Yesterday Dame Devin recommended we expel you.
translation.it: Ieri, dama Devin ha chiesto di espellerti.

translation.en: I can't say I blame her.
I know it's only been a couple of days, but honestly,
translation.it: So che sono passati solo pochi giorni,

translation.en: I don't think I have ever seen
translation.it: ma non credo di aver mai visto

translation.en: such a disaster of a student come through these halls.
translation.it: una studentessa così disastrosa in questi corridoi.

translation.en: I see.
Tell you the truth, I was almost going to do it.
translation.it: A dirti la verità, lo stavo quasi per fare.

translation.en: Did you say "almost"?
[Privet] Almost.
Do you know what it takes to make a princess?
translation.it: Sai cosa ci vuole per essere una principessa?

translation.en: -A crown? -No, not a crown.
translation.it: - Una corona? - No, non una corona.

translation.en: Character.
All our classes in poise, manners, dancing,
translation.it: I corsi di portamento, di buone maniere, di danza

translation.en: they're not superficial.
They build confidence.
But confidence without character is dangerous.
translation.it: Ma la fiducia in sé, senza carattere, è pericolosa.

translation.en: You, Blair, have a different problem.
translation.it: Tu, Blair, hai un altro problema.

translation.en: Character without confidence.
translation.it: Hai carattere ma non hai fiducia in te.

translation.en: So you are going to expel me?
I'm going to tutor you.
If you can dig deep and find the princess inside you,
translation.it: Se riuscirai a trovare la principessa che è in te,

translation.en: I have no doubt you'll graduate
with your pick of any lady royal position.
translation.it: e potrai scegliere dove fare la dama reale.

translation.en: If you can handle it.
Now, what do you say?
Yes!
Uh, rule number one, no hugging the tutor.
translation.it: Regola numero uno, non si abbraccia l'insegnante.

translation.en: Sorry. I just... When do we start?
Right now.
I can do this because I am perfectly comfortable
translation.it: Riesco a farlo perché sono perfettamente a mio agio

translation.en: and at ease with myself and in my body.
translation.it: e tranquilla con me stessa e con il mio corpo.

translation.en: That's because you're not surrounded by people
translation.it: Perché non è circondata da gente

translation.en: who make you feel like a complete nothing.
translation.it: che la fanno sentire una nullità.

translation.en: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
translation.it: Nessuno può farti sentire inferiore, se non glielo permetti.

translation.en: Right. Your turn.
Headmistress Privet, there's no way I can do this.
translation.it: Direttrice Privet, non sono proprio in grado.

translation.en: Not if you don't believe you can.
translation.it: Non se pensi di non essere in grado.

translation.en: We start small.
Thirty seconds, right here on the ground.
That's right. Just like that.
I can't. [grunts] I can't do it.
Yeah, of course you can--
Right. I see we have our work cut out for us.
translation.it: Bene. Vedo che abbiamo un bel da fare.

translation.en: ♪ I don't have the balance ♪
♪ Think I'm gonna fall ♪
♪ Wish I had the talent ♪
♪ I don't belong here at all ♪
translation.it: Non è il mio mondo, lo so

translation.en: ♪ Drowning in the pressure ♪
♪ In over my head ♪
♪ Why did I think I could do this ♪
♪ I could have walked away instead ♪
♪ This is my chance to break free ♪
♪ Everything's depending on me ♪
♪ And if I keep trying I'll be ♪
translation.it: E alla fine ce la farò

translation.en: ♪ On top of the world ♪
♪ Where I can see everything before me ♪
translation.it: E sotto di me vedrò ogni cosa

translation.en: ♪ Reaching up to touch the sky ♪
♪ On top of the world ♪
♪ All my dreams are rushing toward me ♪
translation.it: Lì dove nascono i miei sogni

translation.en: ♪ Stretching out my wings to fly ♪
♪ On top of the world ♪
♪ On top of the world ♪
♪ Nothing's gonna break me ♪
♪ Gonna get it right ♪
♪ Even if it takes me Doing it a thousand times ♪
translation.it: Se anche mille volte Provarci ancora dovrò

translation.en: ♪ Trying once is easy ♪
♪ Discipline is hard ♪
♪ But nothing can defeat me ♪
♪ If the change is in my heart ♪
♪ This is my chance to break free This is my chance ♪
translation.it: - Ma voglio provarci perché - Prova perché

translation.en: ♪ Everything's depending on me On me ♪
translation.it: - Se dipende tutto da me - Da me

translation.en: ♪ And if I keep trying I'll be I'll be ♪
translation.it: - Al fine ce la farò - Farò

translation.en: ♪ On top of the world ♪
♪ Where I can see everything before me ♪
translation.it: E sotto di me vedrò ogni cosa

translation.en: ♪ Stretching out my wings to fly ♪
♪ On top of the world ♪
I need two rows. Ladies on the pink line, gentlemen on the blue.
translation.it: Voglio due file. Le signore sulla linea rosa, i signori su quella azzurra.

translation.en: Welcome, everyone, to our joint dance class
translation.it: Vi do il benvenuto alla lezione di ballo

translation.en: with Prince Charming Academy.
If we could keep the shrieking to a minimum,
translation.it: Se riuscissimo a tenere le urla al minimo,

translation.en: it would be much appreciated.
Hmm, it looks like we'll have one extra lady.
translation.it: Sembra che ci sia una ragazza in più.

translation.en: Delancy, that's the pink line.
translation.it: Delancy, questa è la linea rosa.

translation.en: I just don't see Prince Nicholas.
He's the one I want to dance with.
translation.it: È con lui che voglio ballare.

translation.en: Maybe he's invisible.
No daughter of mine sits on the sidelines at a dance.
translation.it: Nessuna delle mie figlie sta in disparte al ballo.

translation.en: But, Mother...
Looks like you're going to have to sit out this one, dear. Pity.
translation.it: Questa volta non partecipi, cara. Peccato.

translation.en: All right, everyone's paired up! Let's begin!
Okay, come along. Gentlemen, please bow.
translation.it: Ok, forza. Signori, inchinatevi, per favore.

translation.en: Ladies, will you curtsey.
-Sorry I'm late... -[grunting]
Oh, no! I'm so sorry.
It's okay.
No, it's not. I feel awful. Please.
translation.it: No, non è vero. Mi dispiace tanto. Lascia che ti aiuti.

translation.en: Thank you.
Sorry. I didn't mean to be late.
That's fine. The two of you can partner up and join the dance.
translation.it: Non c'è problema. Voi due potete unirvi alle danze in coppia.

translation.en: Now, gentlemen, lightly kiss the top of your partner's hand...
translation.it: Ora, signori, sfiorate con le labbra il dorso della mano della vostra dama.

translation.en: And dance.
Milady, I am Nicholas, young swain from the east,
translation.it: Signora, mi chiamo Nicholas, sono un giovane cadetto dall'est,

translation.en: most privileged to make your acquaintance.
translation.it: che privilegio fare la sua conoscenza.

translation.en: Think that was polite enough?
Absolutely.
Think you can top it?
translation.it: Pensi di saper fare di meglio?

translation.en: I, kind swain, am Blair, maiden of Gardania,
translation.it: Io, gentile cadetto, mi chiamo Blair, sono una fanciulla di Gardania,

translation.en: honored above all to be welcomed into your swaininess.
translation.it: e sono onorata di essere accolta dalla sua cadettosità.

translation.en: -Well done. -I try.
Wonderful, everyone!
Wonderful, now a final bow and curtsey to your partners,
translation.it: Magnifico, ora un ultimo inchino e una riverenza ai vostri partner

translation.en: and we say our farewells to the young gentlemen
of Prince Charming Academy.
Keeping in mind that you will see them again
at the Coronation Day ceremony at the end of the school year.
translation.it: alla cerimonia di incoronazione, alla fine dell'anno accademico.

translation.en: I shall count the moments till then.
translation.it: Conterò i giorni che ci separano.

translation.en: As will I, good sir.
[Privet] I have an exciting announcement.
Thanks to the generosity of Dame Devin,
translation.it: Grazie alla generosità di dama Devin,

translation.en: dinner tonight will be a chance for you to get a taste of your future.
translation.it: la cena di stasera sarà un'occasione per vedere cosa vi riserva il futuro.

translation.en: Our manners class served in the palace.
translation.it: Il corso di buone maniere si terrà a palazzo.

translation.en: -[laughing] Yes! Sweet! -No way!
The palace! Can you even imagine it?
I grew up in the palace, Portia. I live there.
translation.it: Ci sono cresciuta a palazzo, Porzia. Ci abito.

translation.en: But can you imagine it?
To prepare for this event, you'll all have the afternoon
translation.it: Per prepararvi a questo evento, avrete il pomeriggio libero

translation.en: to pamper yourselves in the spa.
Your princess assistants [claps]
will help you take advantage of all the amenities.
translation.it: potrete approfittare di tutti i comfort.

translation.en: Enjoy.
Top thing you've always wanted to see in the palace that you can't wait to see.
translation.it: La cosa che hai sempre voluto vedere a palazzo e che non vedi l'ora di vedere.

translation.en: Blair, go.
Hmm, I've never thought about the palace, but Emily would go nuts for it.
translation.it: Non ho mai pensato al palazzo, ma Emily ne andrebbe matta.

translation.en: I want to remember everything so I can tell her.
translation.it: Voglio ricordarmi tutto, così posso raccontarglielo.

translation.en: [all] Manicure time!
translation.it: - È l'ora della manicure! - È l'ora della manicure!

translation.en: Nice. Isla, go.
I'd love to find out more about what happened
translation.it: Mi piacerebbe saperne di più su quello che è successo

translation.en: to Queen Isabella and her family.
translation.it: alla regina Isabella e alla sua famiglia.

translation.en: They're so mysterious.
So true. I want to find out more about Gardania's magical crown.
translation.it: Verissimo. Voglio saperne di più sulla corona magica di Gardania.

translation.en: Isla mentioned that before.
Emily would love that story.
Oh! Tell her the legend.
It's said that the crown glows when placed on the true heir of Gardania.
translation.it: Si dice che la corona brilli quando viene posta sulla vera erede di Gardania.

translation.en: It lit up on Queen Isabella's head at her coronation,
translation.it: Si illuminò sulla testa della regina Isabella all'incoronazione,

translation.en: but it hasn't been seen since then.
translation.it: ma da allora nessuno l'ha più vista.

translation.en: [all] All done!
These are beautiful.
[Fairies] Thanks.
We should go.
The earlier we get to the palace, the more we can see.
translation.it: Prima arriviamo a palazzo, più cose riusciremo a vedere.

translation.en: [Blair] Our uniforms.
Every one is in shreds!
What are we going to do?
We're not allowed in class without our uniforms.
translation.it: Non possiamo andare a lezione senza le uniformi.

translation.en: And if we skip a class, we get an F.
translation.it: E se saltiamo il corso, prendiamo un'insufficienza.

translation.en: We can't fail!
Coronation Day is two days away!
How could this happen?
Seriously? It was Delancy. It had to be.
translation.it: Scherzi? È stata Delancy. Per forza.

translation.en: She's the queen of "Make Blair Feel Inferior."
translation.it: È la regina del "far sentire Blair inferiore".

translation.en: No. She's not.
No one can make you feel inferior.
Not without your consent.
We're princesses, right?
We don't even have our crowns yet. And you...
translation.it: Ma non ancora abbiamo le corone e tu…

translation.en: I'm not talking about crowns. I'm talking about character.
translation.it: Non sto parlando di corone. Parlo di carattere.

translation.en: The rule is we have to show up to class in uniform, right?
translation.it: La regola è che dobbiamo presentarci in uniforme, giusto?

translation.en: Currently they're a little too breezy.
translation.it: Al momento, sono un po' a pezzi.

translation.en: Hmm. They just need a little alteration.
Won't that make them breezier?
translation.it: Ma così non saranno un po' troppo a pezzi?

translation.en: Hmm. It seems Blair, Hadley, and Isla are running late.
translation.it: Pare che Blair, Hadley e Isla siano in ritardo.

translation.en: I do hope they're not skipping class.
I'd hate to fail anyone so close to Coronation Day.
translation.it: Non vorrei bocciarle quando manca così poco all'incoronazione.

translation.en: Well, time's up.
Oh, come now, Dame Devin.
I think we can wait a few minutes more.
And keep the other students waiting?
That hardly seems fair.
I'm afraid we'll have to fail all three of them.
translation.it: Temo che dovremo bocciarle tutte e tre.

translation.en: [Blair] Wait!
What do you think you're wearing?
Those aren't school-issued uniforms.
translation.it: Quelle non sono le uniformi dell'accademia.

translation.en: Forgive me, madam, but they are, in fact,
translation.it: Mi perdoni, signora, ma in effetti

translation.en: made entirely from the material in our original uniforms.
translation.it: sono fatte interamente con la stoffa delle uniformi originali.

translation.en: But that's against the rules.
Actually, Dame Devin, there is nothing in the dress code
translation.it: In realtà, dama Devin, non ci sono regole che vietano quello che hanno fatto.

translation.en: against what they've done.
translation.it: non ci sono regole che vietano quello che hanno fatto.

translation.en: Right. We just used some hard work to unlock our princess potential.
translation.it: Vero. Abbiamo lavorato sodo per sbloccare il potenziale da principessa.

translation.en: [Privet] And beautifully, at that.
translation.it: E in modo splendido, per giunta.

translation.en: Come, join the class.
[girl] Awesome!
Where did you get new uniforms?
translation.it: Dove avete preso le uniformi nuove?

translation.en: Those are amazing!
We made them. Blair made them.
translation.it: - Le abbiamo fatte noi. - Le ha fatte Blair.

translation.en: How did you do that?
I want one.
I didn't know people made clothes.
translation.it: Non sapevo che i vestiti li facessero le persone.

translation.en: I thought they came from elves. You know, like toast.
translation.it: Pensavo fossero gli elfi. Sai, come i toast.

translation.en: [Privet] Attention, everyone.
Welcome to the royal palace of Gardania.
translation.it: Benvenute al palazzo reale di Gardania.

translation.en: As a special treat you will have some time before the meal
translation.it: Abbiamo una bella sorpresa. Prima del pasto avrete un po' di tempo

translation.en: to explore the first floor of the palace.
translation.it: per esplorare il primo piano del palazzo.

translation.en: Enjoy!
Sweet. Royal secrets, here we come!
[gasps] No way.
Blair. It's a picture of Blair.
translation.it: È Blair. È un ritratto di Blair!

translation.en: That's not possible.
Why would there be a portrait of me?
translation.it: Come mai c'è un mio ritratto?

translation.en: "Princess Isabella, age 18."
That dog.
It couldn't be!
"Queen Isabella, King Reginald, the Princess Sophia, and their loyal dog,
translation.it: "La regina Isabella, il re Reginald, la principessa Sofia e il loro cane,

translation.en: Prince."
No way!
Blair? Do you know when your mom found you on her doorstep?
translation.it: Sai quando tua madre ti ha trovata davanti alla porta di casa?

translation.en: The date? Sure.
I mean, she made it my birthday since she didn't know my real one.
translation.it: L'ha scelto come compleanno, non sapendo quello vero.

translation.en: April 26th.
What?
Blair, you know what April 26th is, don't you?
translation.it: Blair, sai che giorno è il 26 aprile, vero?

translation.en: [Blair] Um, yeah.
My birthday. I just said that.
translation.it: Il mio compleanno. L'ho appena detto.

translation.en: It's the day the royal family died in that car crash.
translation.it: È il giorno in cui la famiglia reale morì nell'incidente.

translation.en: I'm thinking maybe baby Sophia didn't die in that crash.
translation.it: Forse la piccola Sofia non è morta in quell'incidente.

translation.en: Maybe she was found and left on someone's doorstep.
translation.it: Forse è stata trovata e lasciata davanti alla porta di una casa.

translation.en: No!
Yes, look at the portrait.
translation.it: - No. - Sì! Guarda il ritratto, sei identica alla regina Isabella.

translation.en: You look exactly like Queen Isabella!
translation.it: Guarda il ritratto, sei identica alla regina Isabella.

translation.en: You could be baby Sophia.
If it's true, and Dame Devin and Delancy know it,
translation.it: Se fosse vero, e se dama Devin e Delancy lo sanno,

translation.en: that would explain why they're so awful to you,
translation.it: si spiegherebbe perché si comportano così con te.

translation.en: because you're the rightful heir to the throne, and not Delancy!
translation.it: Perché sei la legittima erede al trono, e non Delancy!

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay. That's the craziest thing I've ever heard.
translation.it: Sentite, è la cosa più folle che abbia mai sentito dire.

translation.en: Dinner time! We've gotta go.
translation.it: È ora di cena. Dobbiamo andare.

translation.en: [Hadley] This is serious, you know.
The whole fate of Gardania is at stake.
translation.it: Il destino di Gardania è in pericolo.

translation.en: [Blair] Come on, you guys. It's crazy.
Excuse me!
My daughter has a declaration
translation.it: Mia figlia ha una dichiarazione su come andranno le cose,

translation.en: about how she'll handle things when she's crowned princess
translation.it: Mia figlia ha una dichiarazione su come andranno le cose, quando sarà incoronata principessa tra due giorni.

translation.en: in two days.
translation.it: quando sarà incoronata principessa tra due giorni.

translation.en: Delancy!
I, um...
My brilliant daughter noticed that Gardania's poorer sections
translation.it: La mia splendida figlia ha notato che le zone più povere di Gardania sono la rovina

translation.en: are a blight to the otherwise beautiful community.
translation.it: che le zone più povere di Gardania sono la rovina di questa, altrimenti, bellissima città.

translation.en: -[gasps] -Hey!
To remedy this she will take over those areas,
translation.it: Per porvi rimedio, si approprierà di queste aree,

translation.en: bulldoze the buildings, and turn the land into beautiful rolling parks,
translation.it: demolirà gli edifici e le trasformerà in splendidi parchi

translation.en: full of trees and grass, and streams.
translation.it: pieni di alberi, erba e ruscelli.

translation.en: Wonderful for the environment.
But people live in those areas you just knocked down.
translation.it: Ma c'è gente che vive nelle zone che ha appena raso al suolo.

translation.en: My neighborhood is there.
It is?
Delancy is aware of that.
Those people will move elsewhere.
How? They're like me.
They don't have money. They can't just pick up and move.
translation.it: Non hanno soldi. Non possono andarsene così.

translation.en: If I were you I'd leave this school immediately
translation.it: Se fossi in te, lascerei subito l'accademia

translation.en: and get my family ready to move.
I think it is disgraceful.
Duly noted.
Now, shall we continue our lesson in dinner manners?
translation.it: Dunque, vogliamo continuare la lezione di galateo?

translation.en: Right, then, students, we will start with our salads.
Outermost forks. You may begin.
translation.it: La forchetta più esterna. Potete iniziare.

translation.en: Let's go.
Blair, are you okay?
I'm better than okay.
I'm ready.
Ready for what?
To fight.
If Delancy gets on the throne she's going to ruin my family,
translation.it: Se Delancy sale al trono, rovinerà la mia famiglia

translation.en: and probably this kingdom along with it.
If she gets on the throne?
She can't, if we can prove someone else is the rightful heir.
translation.it: Non se riusciamo a dimostrare che qualcun'altra è l'erede legittima.

translation.en: Gardania's magical crown.
It must be in the palace. Right?
The crown glows when placed on the true heir of Gardania.
translation.it: La corona brilla quando viene posta sulla testa della vera erede di Gardania.

translation.en: But we have to find it before Delancy's coronation.
translation.it: Dobbiamo trovarla prima dell'incoronazione di Delancy.

translation.en: So we have to find the crown...
[all] Tonight.
[Blair] It's time.
Do we have everything we need?
Game on.
What's that?
What's going on?
[in singsong voice] Fire drill! Fire drill! There's no time!
Single file! In a line!
Hmm. I don't see a fire drill on the schedule.
translation.it: Non vedo esercitazioni antincendio in programma.

translation.en: What about the plan?
We wait a little longer.
Hopefully, this will be fast.
Lovely day for a surprise fire drill, isn't it, darling?
translation.it: Ottima giornata per un'esercitazione a sorpresa, vero, tesoro?

translation.en: Mom, what did you do?
Oh! What have you done to your uniform?
I like it, Mother.
Ugh! Come on. Let's join the others outside.
[Privet on PA] Attention, students! You may now return to your rooms!
translation.it: Avviso alle studentesse, potete tornare nelle vostre stanze.

translation.en: How much time did we lose?
Thirty minutes.
Plus another 15 minutes trying to untangle Portia from the tether ball pole.
translation.it: Più altri quindici per liberare Porzia dalla rete dalla porta di calcio.

translation.en: Let's go.
Thieves! They're thieves, I tell you.
Arrest them.
What?
I'm sure it's some kind of mistake,
translation.it: Sono certa che si tratti di un errore,

translation.en: but Dame Devin believes you stole her jewelry.
translation.it: ma dama Devin crede che tu le abbia rubato i gioielli.

translation.en: No! I would never!
Not to save your poor family about to lose their home?
translation.it: Neanche per salvare la tua famiglia che sta per perdere la casa?

translation.en: I doubt that.
Plus my daughter, Delancy, saw you.
translation.it: E poi mia figlia Delancy ti ha visto.

translation.en: Didn't you tell me you saw Blair poking around in my office the other day?
translation.it: Non mi avevi detto di aver visto Blair curiosare nel mio ufficio l'altro giorno?

translation.en: [stammering] I don't...
I don't remember exactly, but...
translation.it: Non mi ricordo di preciso, però…

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I did.
I demand you search their room.
translation.it: Voglio che perquisiate la loro stanza.

translation.en: [all] What?
Girls, it's procedure.
If you have nothing to hide, it shouldn't matter.
translation.it: Se non avete niente da nascondere, non c'è niente da temere.

translation.en: Look what I found.
My jewelry!
That's not...
I didn't put that there.
translation.it: Non ce li ho messi io!

translation.en: Here's another.
No way!
One more.
We didn't steal anything.
Don't lie. It's unbecoming.
Lock them up.
Headmistress Privet, I promise you.
With the evidence and the witness I'm afraid I have no choice.
translation.it: Con prove e testimone, temo di non avere altra scelta.

translation.en: Brock, take them to the detaining room.
translation.it: Brock, portale in sala di detenzione.

translation.en: We can't investigate until after the ceremony tomorrow.
translation.it: Potremo indagare solo dopo la cerimonia di domani.

translation.en: You will remain detained until that time.
translation.it: Sarete detenute qui fino a quel momento.

translation.en: Detained?
As in, locked up?
During the coronation?
I'm afraid so.
Unless there is another way to explain this.
translation.it: A meno che non ci sia un'altra spiegazione.

translation.en: How very disappointing.
I'll say.
Isla, Hadley, I'm so sorry.
Now neither of you will become princesses.
Don't sweat it.
Who needs a tiara anyway?
translation.it: A cosa serve la coroncina, poi?

translation.en: They just make your head itch.
translation.it: Ti fa solo prudere la testa.

translation.en: And it's not easy to kick a ball in four-inch heels.
translation.it: E non è facile dare i calci alla palla con i tacchi alti.

translation.en: [Delancy] Brock, stop!
I've got something else in mind for the prisoners.
translation.it: Ho in mente qualcos'altro per le prigioniere.

translation.en: You may turn them over to me.
But my orders...
Will officially come from me in only a few hours.
translation.it: Tra qualche ora li riceverai ufficialmente da me.

translation.en: The keys?
They're all yours.
Thank you. You may go.
If this is your way or rubbing it in, you don't have to.
translation.it: Se vuoi girare il coltello nella piaga, evita.

translation.en: You've won.
Yeah, we get it.
-[shushing] -What are you--
I'm supposed to be asleep.
Tell me,
are you really Princess Sophia?
I... I don't know for sure.
But I think so.
I think so, too.
This is a map of the palace basement.
translation.it: È una mappa delle segrete del palazzo.

translation.en: There's something of yours inside the vault.
translation.it: C'è una cosa tua nel caveau.

translation.en: Gardania's magical crown?
[Delancy] You have to get it.
Let everyone know the truth before coronation.
translation.it: Tutti devono sapere la verità prima dell'incoronazione.

translation.en: Once I'm crowned, it's too late.
translation.it: Se mi incoronano, sarà troppo tardi.

translation.en: Gardania's mine for life.
You don't want that?
I want what's right.
I have to get back. My mother will be looking for me.
translation.it: Devo andare via. Mia madre mi starà cercando.

translation.en: Thank you.
I'll leave a window open for you on the third floor.
translation.it: Vi lascio una finestra aperta al terzo piano.

translation.en: Good luck.
Hey, Prince.
Aw, don't look at me like that.
[groans] I can't play fetch, I'm on duty.
translation.it: Non posso giocare con te, sono in servizio.

translation.en: Hey!
Prince. Prince. No, no. Prince, come here. I gotta work.
translation.it: Principe. No. Principe, vieni qui. Devo lavorare!

translation.en: Prince. Prince. Come on.
Come here.
[Blair] That's the window.
Let's hope Delancy did what she said she would.
translation.it: Speriamo che Delancy abbia fatto quello che ha detto.

translation.en: You're sure this will work?
Positive! Just hold on tight and don't look down.
translation.it: Sicurissima. Tieniti forte e non guardare giù.

translation.en: [Guard] Come. Come on. Come on.
Come on.
Prince, hey.
Drop it. Drop it. Drop it.
Come back here!
The elevator should be right down this hall.
translation.it: L'ascensore dovrebbe essere in fondo al corridoio.

translation.en: [Dame Devin] It's time for you to be asleep, Delancy.
translation.it: È ora di andare a letto, Delancy.

translation.en: You've a big day tomorrow.
translation.it: Domani ti aspetta una giornata importante.

translation.en: Don't move.
What now?
Laser alarm. We've got 'em at home.
translation.it: L'allarme laser. Ce l'ho anche a casa.

translation.en: If we break the beams, alarms go off.
translation.it: Se interrompiamo il raggio, scatta l'allarme.

translation.en: I can't see any beams.
Perhaps a little touch up will help.
[Hadley] Nice.
So, how good are you guys at gymnastics?
I do a mean tree pose.
translation.it: Sono brava a fare la posizione dell'albero.

translation.en: I think I can do a somersault.
Follow me.
[exclaiming] No! This way.
Careful!
Huh? Okay.
No, no. Whoa!
[automated voice] Welcome, Dame Devin. Your security is our priority.
translation.it: Benvenuta, dama Devin. La sicurezza è la nostra priorità.

translation.en: Please enter your password.
Password?
Try something. What would Dame Devin choose?
translation.it: Prova qualcosa. Che sceglierebbe dama Devin?

translation.en: Delancy's coronation day?
Today's date.
[automated voice] You seem to be having trouble.
translation.it: Sembra che ci siano problemi con il codice.

translation.en: Would you like your password hint?
[all] Yes.
Your hint is, "The day it all fell into place."
translation.it: Il suggerimento è: "Il giorno in cui le cose sono andate al loro posto".

translation.en: Ten seconds until your lockdown.
-The day it all fell into place? -Nine, eight... -What does that mean? -...seven, six...
translation.it: Il giorno in cui le cose sono andate al loro posto? Cioè?

translation.en: Wait. "The day it all fell into place."
translation.it: Un momento. "Il giorno in cui le cose sono andate al loro posto."

translation.en: The day Dame Devin's plans started working.
translation.it: Il giorno in cui è partito il piano di dama Devin.

translation.en: The day of the car crash.
Thank you, Dame Devin.
Enjoy.
Not in here!
[gasping] Hadley, Isla, look!
Gardania's magical crown!
How do we get it out of the case?
translation.it: Come la tiriamo fuori dalla teca?

translation.en: [Dame Devin] You won't.
But I shouldn't have too much trouble with it.
translation.it: Ma per me non è un grosso problema.

translation.en: [evil laugh] Goodbye, Blair.
Enjoy Coronation Day.
[Blair] No!
[sighing] That's it. We're sunk.
translation.it: È tutto finito. Ci ha fregato.

translation.en: [Andrea] Well, Phil, here it is. The day we've all been waiting for!
translation.it: Beh, Phil, ci siamo. Il giorno che tutti stavamo aspettando.

translation.en: [Phil] My birthday?
[Andrea] No, it's Coronation Day.
Even now, our beloved princesses-in-training
translation.it: E adesso, le nostre amate principesse

translation.en: are pulling into the royal palace to receive their royal crowns
translation.it: entrano nel palazzo reale per ricevere le corone reali

translation.en: on their royal heads.
Ladies and gentlemen!
I welcome you to our annual Graduation
translation.it: vi do il benvenuto alla cerimonia di diploma e incoronazione.

translation.en: -and Coronation Day... -This will be the best
translation.it: vi do il benvenuto alla cerimonia di diploma e incoronazione. Sarà il miglior giorno dell'incoronazione di sempre, non credi?

translation.en: Coronation Day ever, don't you think?
translation.it: Sarà il miglior giorno dell'incoronazione di sempre, non credi?

translation.en: Grace, go find Miss Privet and tell her where we are.
translation.it: Grace, va' dalla direttrice Privet e dille dove siamo.

translation.en: Now, what are we going to do?
You are hereby dubbed Lady Royal Josette of Zinnia.
translation.it: Ti proclamo dama reale Josette di Zinnia.

translation.en: You are hereby dubbed Princess Miranda of Philadelphia.
translation.it: Ti proclamo principessa Miranda di Philadelphia.

translation.en: You are hereby dubbed Princess Portia of Narcissia.
translation.it: Ti proclamo principessa Porzia di Narcisia.

translation.en: Ugh! There is no service at all down here.
Hmm. What's this?
Stand back!
If only there was a keypad inside the vault.
translation.it: Se solo ci fosse un tastierino dentro il caveau.

translation.en: Maybe there is!
Standing before me now is Delancy Devin,
translation.it: Adesso davanti a me c'è Delancy Devin,

translation.en: who will now govern our beloved and flourishing country, Gardania.
translation.it: a cui spetta governare il nostro amato e prospero Paese, Gardania.

translation.en: Delancy, I now crown you
-Princess of... -Wait!
translation.it: Delancy, ti incorono principessa di… Un momento!

translation.en: Uh... Proper princess protocol! [fanfare stops]
The bylaws state that before a new princess can be crowned,
translation.it: Lo statuto dice che prima di incoronare una nuova principessa,

translation.en: the entire assembly must spin around seven times,
translation.it: l'intero collegio deve fare sette giravolte,

translation.en: in honor of the seven hills of Gardania.
translation.it: in onore delle sette colline di Gardania.

translation.en: [all murmuring] What is she doing? I don't know.
What are you doing? You need to be crowned!
I just... Uh... Want to do it properly.
translation.it: È che… voglio fare le cose per bene.

translation.en: Spin, you say?
It is indeed proper protocol. [clears throat]
In honor of the seven hills of Gardania,
translation.it: In onore delle sette colline di Gardania,

translation.en: let us rise and spin around seven times!
-[beeping] -[Blair] I got it!
The phone's linked up with the keypad.
translation.it: Il telefono è collegato al tastierino.

translation.en: Day of the car crash.
Ugh! Dame Devin must have changed the code.
translation.it: Dama Devin deve aver cambiato il codice.

translation.en: You're right!
I heard Dame Devin change it when the doors were closing.
translation.it: Ho sentito che lo cambiava quando si sono chiuse le porte.

translation.en: I heard it too!
That's what I've been humming this whole time.
Let me see the phone.
Do, re, mi...
[gasps] I got it!
-Woo! -Yes!
We did it!
Now, hop on one foot to honor those who have hopped before us.
translation.it: Ora, saltate su un piede, in onore di chi ha saltato prima di noi.

translation.en: Bless you.
Hey! What are you doing here?
And now everyone must pat his head and rub his stomach at the same time.
translation.it: Tocchiamoci la testa e, allo stesso tempo, accarezziamoci la pancia.

translation.en: Enough!
The protocols have been satisfied! Crown her!
translation.it: I protocolli sono stati rispettati. Incoronala!

translation.en: [Blair] Wait!
No! Do not wait!
I am making a claim to the throne, because I am Princess Sophia,
translation.it: Rivendico il trono, perché sono la principessa Sofia,

translation.en: daughter of Queen Isabella!
You know, there is a resemblance.
This is ridiculous!
The princess died 17 years ago.
translation.it: La principessa è morta 17 anni fa.

translation.en: Finish the coronation
and make Princess Delancy ruler of Gardania for life!
translation.it: e rendi la principessa Delancy sovrana di Gardania a vita!

translation.en: Dame Devin, this is a serious claim and we have to...
translation.it: Dama Devin, è una dichiarazione seria, e dobbiamo…

translation.en: We have to crown my daughter.
Come on!
Oh! Get away!
It is Princess Sophia!
You useless child!
Do you have any idea what you've done?
translation.it: Hai idea di quello che hai fatto?

translation.en: I eliminated Queen Isabella so you could be princess one day.
translation.it: Ho eliminato la regina Isabella perché tu diventassi principessa!

translation.en: [chuckling nervously] No, that's not what I meant.
Guards, please take her away.
No! You can't do this to me!
Get your hands off me!
You have to crown Delancy! You have to!
You'll pay for this!
Blair... That is, Princess Sophia,
is there anything you would like to say to your new subjects?
translation.it: c'è qualcosa che vorresti dire ai tuoi nuovi sudditi?

translation.en: Hello.
I'm just a regular girl.
But I think Headmistress Privet is right
translation.it: Ma penso che la direttrice Privet abbia ragione,

translation.en: when she says every girl has princess potential.
translation.it: quando dice che ogni ragazza ha potenziale da principessa.

translation.en: It is an honor to be your princess.
translation.it: È un onore essere la vostra principessa.

translation.en: Blair, this is when the Princess of Gardania
translation.it: Blair, adesso la principessa di Gardania

translation.en: chooses her lady royal.
Now, I know it's an important decision, so if you need more time, then...
translation.it: So che è una decisione importante, quindi se ti serve più tempo…

translation.en: I already know who I want.
It would be an incredible privilege if my lady royal could be...
translation.it: Sarebbe un onore incredibile se la mia dama reale fosse…

translation.en: But Blair, why me?
I was horrible to you.
I wouldn't be wearing this crown without your help.
translation.it: Senza il tuo aiuto non avrei mai indossato questa corona.

translation.en: Will you accept?
I would be honored, Your Highness.
[Judge] Lady Royal Delancy of Gardania.
[Privet] Ladies and gentlemen, royals of all ages,
translation.it: Signore e signori, nobili di ogni età…

translation.en: -[Prince barking] -and dogs,
translation.it: Signore e signori, nobili di ogni età… e cani, è ora di festeggiare!

translation.en: it's time to party!
translation.it: e cani, è ora di festeggiare!

translation.en: Here's a special track I wrote myself.
Hope you like it!
♪ All of us ♪
♪ Fabulous ♪
♪ Put your hands in the air All of us ♪
♪ We rule, we rule this school ♪
♪ We rule it We rule it ♪
♪ All of us ♪ Fabulous ♪
♪ And this is how we do it ♪
No way! You're spinning your tunes?
translation.it: Non ci credo! Suoni la tua musica?

translation.en: It was totally time.
I love it!
Hey, Blair, don't look now, but look now.
translation.it: Ehi, Blair, non guardare adesso, ma guarda adesso.

translation.en: Congratulations, Princess... Um...
You can call me Blair.
Congratulations on your coronation, too, Prince Nicholas.
translation.it: Congratulazioni anche a te per l'incoronazione, principe Nicholas.

translation.en: Wouldst thou do me the honor of a dance?
translation.it: Mi farebbe l'onore di concedermi un ballo?

translation.en: I would be most delighted.
♪ Jump up, hands in the air ♪
translation.it: Saltate su e giù Mani in aria

translation.en: ♪ Crowns on our head, lighter than air ♪
translation.it: Corone in testa Leggere come l'aria

translation.en: ♪ Come on, now, spin to the left ♪
translation.it: Adesso, a sinistra girate E poi a destra lo rifate

translation.en: ♪ Spin to the right, we're graduating ♪
translation.it: Adesso, a sinistra girate E poi a destra lo rifate Ci siamo diplomate

translation.en: ♪ And it's our night ♪
♪ We rule this school ♪
♪ We rule this school ♪
♪ It's friendship that makes us strong ♪
♪ And we all belong ♪ ♪ Yeah, we all belong ♪
translation.it: Qui non si fanno torti Sì, non si fanno torti

translation.en: ♪ We rule this school ♪
Your Highness? There are some important people here to see you.
translation.it: Sua Altezza? Ci sono delle persone importanti qui per te.

translation.en: [gasping] Emily! Mom!
Welcome to our new home!
Really? We get to live in the palace?
We do.
Oh, Blair.
I know it's not exactly the place we dreamed about...
translation.it: So che non è proprio quello che sognavamo.

translation.en: Are you kidding? It's better than anything we ever dreamed about!
translation.it: Scherzi, vero? È meglio di qualsiasi sogno.

translation.en: It is now that the two of you are here.
translation.it: Lo è, adesso che voi due siete qui.

translation.en: If you're a princess now, does that mean I'm a princess, too?
translation.it: Se adesso tu sei una principessa, lo sono anch'io?

translation.en: Of course.
There is a princess in every girl.
translation.it: C'è una principessa in ogni ragazza.

translation.en: Come on. I wanna introduce you to everyone!
♪ Jump up, hands in the air ♪
translation.it: Saltate su e giù Mani in aria

translation.en: ♪ Crowns on our head, lighter than air ♪
translation.it: Corone in testa Leggere come l'aria

translation.en: ♪ Come on, now, spin to the left ♪
translation.it: Adesso, a sinistra girate E poi a destra lo rifate

translation.en: ♪ Spin to the right, we're graduating ♪
translation.it: Adesso, a sinistra girate E poi a destra lo rifate Ci siamo diplomate

translation.en: ♪ And it's our night ♪
♪ You can see it in her flair ♪
translation.it: "C'È UNA PRINCIPESSA IN OGNI RAGAZZA." - BARBIE

translation.en: ♪ She'll turn the world around ♪
